title: How to spend money on RP when in a different region?
body: I recently tried to purchase RP on my EUW account from North America, but it always says that it's not valid, i've tried multiple times and the information is correct. How do i get RP on my EUW account from North America without using a paypal?

replies.body: Are you playing on the EUW region by residing in NA? Your Are you also trying to use USD or another currency? With this info I can help further. Thanks

Yes i am it says im using USD when i try to pay.

Because you're using USD, it's going to be pretty tough without Paypal. Is there any particular reason you can't use it? We've got a really neat guide on how to properly use it with our store, which you can find [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753084-PayPal)

Let me know if you have any questions.
